quotes.quote: Food is a great way of communicating.
Eat, as nobody is watching. Enjoy food like that's the only thing left in your world.
Part of the secret to success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.
Food, in the end, in our own tradition, is something holy. It's not about nutrients and calories. It's about sharing. It's about honesty. It's about identity.
Food is one of the great organizing tools.
We all eat, and it would be a sad waste of opportunity to eat badly.
Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
A good food is mouthwatering when you see it and finger licking when you eat it.
Food for the body is not enough. There must be food for the soul.
Food is not rational. Food is culture, habit, craving and identity.
So long as you have food in your mouth, you have solved all questions for the time being.
One cannot thing well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
Good food is the basis of true happiness.
Food is better medicine than drugs.
Enjoy your food, enjoy your life.
You don't have to cook fancy or complicated masterpieces, just good food from fresh ingredients.
One of the very nicest things about life is the way we must regularly stop whatever it is we are doing and devote our attention to eating.
We should look for someone to eat and drink with before looking for something to eat and drink.
Food is a passion. Food is love.
Good bread is the most fundamentally satisfying of all foods; and good bread with fresh butter, the greatest of feasts.
A human being is primarily a bag for putting food into.
A balanced diet is a cookie in each hand.
Some people when they see cheese, chocolate or cake they don't think of calories.
Food is our common ground, a universal experience.
Food is an important part of a balanced diet.
Food is a part of our contract with life.
People who love to eat are always the best people.
If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.
Pasta doesn't make you fat. How much pasta you eat makes you fat.
Food is symbolic of love when words are inadequate.
